mean_cn: n. 死记硬背，机械的做法，生搬硬套
mean_en: (often used as an adjective) the process of learning something by repeating it until you remember it rather than by understanding the meaning of it
sentence: I learnt English words by rote, which was not an efficient method.
sentence_trans: 我靠死记硬背来学英语单词，这种方式没有效率。
